channel.title: GAY PKILE WEBCLIENT Korasi || Completionist Cape | x10 hits
channel.description:
Webclient at :[url=http://WWW.gayILE.NET]Your SMF 2 Forum - Index[/url]
client download at [url=http://WWW.gayILE.NET]Your SMF 2 Forum - Index[/url]
Features:
New Hit Splats - Highscores - Double Xp Weekends - Automated Voting Rewards - Skill Points - 100% Summoning skill, familiars with effects - Daily Community Events(Owners participate too!) - Unique Slayer Tasks - Dragonfire Shields charged by dragons - Paid vBulletin Powered Forum - 24-7 Uptime - Active helpful staff - Donator Benefits - Vote4Reward System - Updates Everyday! - Completely Lag Free! - Active, knowledgable staff team - All Skillcapes with working emotes - Economy! All dupes are patched - Ancient Prayers! - Summoing: Familars like Steel Titans, Pack yaks, THEM ALL. - Bosses! (God Wars, KBD DKs, TDs, Jad, and loads more ! ) - Downloadable Client and Web Client - Frost bones for prayer! - Working Korasi Sword+Special! - Working Dragon Claws! - Staff of Light - Every Skill Trainable! Even Summoning and hunter! - Dragon Defender! - All PvP Armor: Vesta, Statius, Morrigan, Zuriel - Pk Point Shops - 100% Working Overloads and Spec Restores! - Elysian and Divine Spirit Shield effects! - Rocktail Fishing+Cooking! With eating effects!
100% Curses PVM+PVP
- Protect Item - All Saps - All Deflects - Berserker - All Leeches - Wrath - Soul Split - Turmoil
Minigames
- Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar Cave - Fight Pits - Duel Arena - Warrior Guild!
Turmoil effects -
Increases attack and defence by 15%, plus 15% of enemy¹s level, and strength by 23%, plus 10% of enemy¹s level.
Soul split effects -
20% of damage done to NPCS is added to your health. 40% of damage done to players is added to your health.
- Divine and Elysian spirit shields effect are accurate to RS. (E.G. Divine blocks 30% of damage, and Elysian has a 70% chance of blocking 25% of damage.)
- Great rewards system based upon how many player killer points you have.
- Chaotic staff and arcane stream necklace have magic attack bonuses for higher magic hits.
- All PVP weapons with correct specials.(E.G. Statius¹s warhammer reduces enemies defense.)
- Godwars dungeon and bosses working 100%(Ten Kills needed to get into a boss chamber.)
- All specials for correct weapons working 100%
- Unique monster teleports and bosses to kill for many items.
- Great PVM system which currently has realistic hits, max hits.
- Good XP rates.
- Good skilling .(Some skills need to be fixed up, but they work overall.)
- Many minigames to be played. (E.G. Champions Challenge, Fight cave, Duel arena, Barrows.
- Active owner and staff.
- Daily updates and bug fixes.
- Staff positions are available to those that earn them.
[IMG]http://i1202.photobucket.com/albums/bb367/aceofpking/pk%20xile%20photos/nrershitsrange.png[/img]
